title: Imogen Anthony and Kyle Sandilands 'trying for a baby'
text:
She's previously hinted that the pitter patter of tiny feet could soon become a reality.

And now it appears Imogen Anthony is trying for a baby with shock jock DJ Kyle Sandilands.

The 28-year-old model took to Instagram on Friday while on holiday in Aruba saying she was 'fertile as f***'

Holiday fun: Imogen Anthony, who is currently on holiday, revealed that she's 'fertile' and hinted that she's been trying for a baby with partner Kyle Sandilands

In the post shared to her story, Imogen wrote: 'When you're fertile af [as f***] and want him now but you're on holidays coz [sic] you wanted me time but now it's backfired.'

The leggy blonde has been sharing glamorous snaps from her time abroad, boasting glorious weather and days spent on the beach.

But it seems she's missing her other half Kyle.

Only a few months ago, Imogen, who is twenty years Kyle's junior, hinted she was ready to have children with the outspoken radio host.

Feeling broody? It appears Imogen is trying for a baby with shock jock boyfriend Kyle

'Looking forward to having kids soon, LOL,' she wrote, alongside a photo of a lactating statue.

It came after a report that the showbiz couple had split but Imogen was quick to hit back about rumours.

Speaking to Daily Mail Australia at Maxim's 8th birthday party in July, Imogen admitted that the reports had 'upset' her.

Fake news! Imogen was quick to hit back about rumours after reports circulated that she had broken up with shock jock boyfriend Kyle Sandilands

'They can go f**k themselves, I really do not care,' Imogen said in her typically unfiltered style.

Despite saying she doesn't care what people think, the fashion designer admitted that she finds it difficult to understand how someone could intentionally spread such false accusations.

Imogen and Kyle have proved themselves to be one of the showbiz world's strongest couples, after going public with their romance in 2011.

Since then, their love has flourished, with the pair moving into a new home together in Hunters Hill, on Sydney's lower north shore.
description: She's previously hinted that the pitter patter of tiny feet could soon become a reality.
authors: Jess Bell For Daily Mail Australia
